page.title: 14Information Centre,Pevensey
page.content: Six years ago members of Pevensey Parish Council and Age Concern decided to start an{Information and Caring Centre,funded by contributions from local organizations and the County Council.It is in rooms opposite the Health Centre in the middle of Pevensey Bay.The Centre is{manned {morning and afternoon in the summer and{mornings only in the winter}by 25 volunteers.Each year they have about 6000 enquires mainly about{tourism from summer visitors and about{aspects {of welfare}from residents .There is a large range of{free leaflets}with all kinds of information,places to visit, benefits that can be claimed and safety hints.They never run out of leaflets as supplies are delivered each week.Although the range of information wanted is very wide they are never unable to answer questions.
